DataSpec.WQL: select * from MicrosoftIE_Cache
select * from MicrosoftIE_Certificate
select * from MicrosoftIE_ConnectionSettings
select * from MicrosoftIE_ConnectionSummary
select * from MicrosoftIE_ElementSetting
select * from MicrosoftIE_FileVersion
select * from MicrosoftIE_InternetExplorer
select * from MicrosoftIE_LanSettings
select * from MicrosoftIE_Object
select * from MicrosoftIE_Publisher
select * from MicrosoftIE_Security
select * from MicrosoftIE_Summary
SELECT Caption FROM Win32_PageFileUsage
SELECT Description, Manufacturer, MaxClockSpeed FROM Win32_Processor
SELECT Capacity FROM Win32_PhysicalMemory
SELECT Name, Manufacturer, Model, SystemType, UserName FROM Win32_ComputerSystem
SELECT * FROM Win32_TimeZone
SELECT * FROM Win32_DeviceMemoryAddress
SELECT * FROM Win32_DMAChannel
SELECT * FROM Win32_IRQResource
SELECT * FROM Win32_PnPAllocatedResource
SELECT DeviceName, IsSigned, DeviceClass, DriverVersion, DriverDate, MFG, InfName, DriverName, DeviceID FROM Win32_PnPSignedDriver
SELECT Caption, Manufacturer, Status, PNPDeviceID FROM Win32_SoundDevice

SELECT Name, PNPDeviceID, VideoProcessor, AdapterCompatibility, Description, AdapterRAM, InstalledDisplayDrivers, DriverVersion, InfFilename, InfSection, NumberOfColorPlanes, CurrentNumberOfColors, CurrentHorizontalResolution, CurrentVerticalResolution, CurrentRefreshRate, CurrentBitsPerPixel FROM Win32_VideoController
SELECT Caption FROM Win32_InfraredDevice
SELECT Name, DriverName, PortName, ServerName FROM Win32_Printer
SELECT Caption, PNPDeviceID, __PATH FROM Win32_USBController
SELECT * FROM Win32_USBControllerDevice
SELECT Drive, Description, MediaLoaded, MediaType, Name, Manufacturer, Status, TransferRate, SCSITargetId, PNPDeviceID FROM Win32_CDRomDrive
SELECT * FROM Win32_CIMLogicalDeviceCIMDataFile
SELECT Caption, PNPDeviceID, ConfigManagerErrorCode FROM Win32_PnPEntity
SELECT * FROM Win32_PnPAllocatedResource
SELECT DeviceName, IsSigned, DeviceClass, DriverVersion, DriverDate, MFG, InfName, DriverName, DeviceID FROM Win32_PnPSignedDriver
SELECT EightDotThreeFileName, Manufacturer, Description, Status, Name, Version, FileSize, CreationDate, Group FROM Win32_CODECFile
SELECT Name, VariableValue, UserName FROM Win32_Environment

SELECT Document, Size, Owner, Notify, Status, TimeSubmitted, StartTime, UntilTime, ElapsedTime, PagesPrinted, JobId, Priority, Parameters, DriverName, PrintProcessor, HostPrintQueue, DataType, Name FROM Win32_PrintJob
SELECT DisplayName, Name, State, StartMode, ServiceType, PathName, ErrorControl, StartName, TagId FROM Win32_Service
SELECT * FROM Win32_OperatingSystem
SELECT Name, ExecutablePath, ProcessID, Priority, MinimumWorkingSetSize, MaximumWorkingSetSize, CreationDate FROM Win32_Process
SELECT DriveType, DeviceID, Description, Compressed, FileSystem, Size, FreeSpace, VolumeName, VolumeSerialNumber, PNPDeviceID, ProviderName FROM Win32_LogicalDisk
SELECT ServiceName, IPAddress, IPSubnet, DefaultIPGateway, DHCPEnabled, DHCPServer, DHCPLeaseExpires, DHCPLeaseObtained, MACAddress, Index FROM Win32_NetworkAdapterConfiguration
SELECT LocalName, RemoteName, ResourceType, ConnectionType, UserName FROM Win32_NetworkConnection

SELECT Name, ConnectionlessService, GuaranteesDelivery, GuaranteesSequencing, MaximumAddressSize, MaximumMessageSize, MessageOriented, MinimumAddressSize, PseudoStreamOriented, SupportsBroadcasting, SupportsConnectData, SupportsDisconnectData, SupportsEncryption, SupportsExpeditedData, SupportsGracefulClosing, SupportsGuaranteedBandwidth, SupportsMulticasting FROM Win32_NetworkProtocol
SELECT TimeGenerated, SourceName, Message FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE EventIdentifier = 1000
SELECT TimeGenerated, SourceName, Message FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE EventIdentifier = 1001
SELECT TimeGenerated, SourceName, Message FROM Win32_NTLogEvent WHERE EventIdentifier = 1002
SELECT Description, Name, Layout, PNPDeviceID, NumberOfFunctionKeys FROM Win32_Keyboard
SELECT HardwareType, NumberOfButtons, Status, PNPDeviceID, PowerManagementSupported, DoubleSpeedThreshold, Handedness FROM Win32_PointingDevice

SELECT Name, Status, PNPDeviceID, MaximumInputBufferSize, MaximumOutputBufferSize, SettableBaudRate, SettableDataBits, SettableFlowControl, SettableParity, SettableParityCheck, SettableStopBits, SettableRLSD, SupportsRLSD, Supports16BitMode, SupportsSpecialCharacters, DeviceID FROM Win32_SerialPort

SELECT BaudRate, BitsPerByte, StopBits, Parity, IsBusy, AbortReadWriteOnError, BinaryModeEnabled, ContinueXMitOnXOff, CTSOutflowControl, DiscardNULLBytes, DSROutflowControl, DSRSensitivity, DTRFlowControlType, EOFCharacter, ErrorReplaceCharacter, ErrorReplacementEnabled, EventCharacter, ParityCheckEnabled, RTSFlowControlType, XOffCharacter, XOffXMitThreshold, XOnCharacter, XOnXMitThreshold, XOnXOffInFlowControl, XOnXOffOutFlowControl, Name FROM Win32_SerialPortConfiguration
SELECT Name, PNPDeviceID FROM Win32_ParallelPort

SELECT Description, Manufacturer, Model, BytesPerSector, MediaLoaded, MediaType, Partitions, SCSIBus, SCSILogicalUnit, SCSIPort, SCSITargetId, SectorsPerTrack, Size, TotalCylinders, TotalSectors, TotalTracks, TracksPerCylinder, PNPDeviceID, Index FROM Win32_DiskDrive
SELECT Caption, Size, StartingOffset, DiskIndex FROM Win32_DiskPartition
SELECT Caption, Manufacturer, Status, PNPDeviceID FROM Win32_IDEController
SELECT Version, SMBIOSPresent, SMBIOSBIOSVersion, ReleaseDate FROM Win32_BIOS
SELECT * FROM Win32_PortResource

SELECT Caption, Description, DeviceID, DeviceType, AttachedTo, AnswerMode, PNPDeviceID, ProviderName, ModemInfPath, ModemInfSection, BlindOff, BlindOn, CompressionOff, CompressionOn, ErrorControlForced, ErrorControlOff, ErrorControlOn, FlowControlHard, FlowControlOff, FlowControlSoft, DCB, Default, InactivityTimeout, ModulationBell, ModulationCCITT, Prefix, Properties, Pulse, Reset, ResponsesKeyName, SpeakerModeDial, SpeakerModeOff, SpeakerModeOn, SpeakerModeSetup, SpeakerVolumeHigh, SpeakerVolumeLow, SpeakerVolumeMed, StringFormat, Terminator, Tone FROM Win32_POTSModem
SELECT Caption, Command, User, Location FROM Win32_StartupCommand
SELECT Name, Description, PathName, ServiceType, Started, StartMode, State, Status, ErrorControl, AcceptPause, AcceptStop FROM Win32_SystemDriver
SELECT GroupName, Name, UserName FROM Win32_ProgramGroup
SELECT Caption, Manufacturer, Status, PNPDeviceID FROM Win32_SCSIController
